title: HOLY CRAP VALVE! THEY DID IT! CS:GO is going to be so fucking good now with anti-cheaters/smurfs
body:
http://i.imgur.com/vAoqji0.png?1

Absolutely incredible. 

tl;dr

They make it to where you can upgrade to a Prime account using your current phone number, and only being able to do it ONCE on an account.
As long as you aren't banned/vac'd you can use this new matchmaking.

Get fucked, Riot.
